modName: Als Shout Like a Dragon - Dragonlike Cooldowns
summary: Dragons can shout a lot more than you can. Even the Greybeards can! If you are a dragon in a mortal body, shouldn't you be able to shout as often as dragons? In the base game, you are given longer cooldowns for balancing purposes. This mod shortens the cooldowns for different shouts to make them more like the cooldowns on the shouts the dra
descriptionHtml:
Dragons can shout a lot more than you can. Even the Greybeards can! If you are a dragon in a mortal body, shouldn't you be able to shout as often as dragons? In the base game, you are given longer cooldowns for balancing purposes. This mod shortens the cooldowns for different shouts to make them more like the cooldowns on the shouts the dragons and Greybeards use.

This mod is intended to promote more shout-centric gameplay. By itself, it's a totally unbalanced cheat (hence its categorization as a cheat), but my playstyle with this mod is to use Elys' Community Uncapper mod to [b]lower[/b] my skill level cap to [i]50[/i] (instead of raising it way above 100), which further encourages the utility of shouts over other skills.

There are four different files to download. Choose [b]ONE[/b] of them. [i][b]Shout Like a Dragon[/b][/i] affects only vanilla shouts. [i][b]Shout Like a Dragon - Dawnguard[/b][/i] affects both vanilla shouts and shouts added by the [i]Dawnguard[/i] DLC. [i][b]Shout Like a Dragon - Dragonborn[/b][/i] affects both vanilla shouts and shouts added by the [i]Dragonborn[/i] DLC. Finally, [i][b]Shout Like a Dragon - DG & DB[/b][/i] affects all shouts in the game, including both DLC.

I repeat, choose only [b]ONE[/b] of these.

Here's the nitty-gritty on the new cooldowns. They are given in order of cooldown per word (i.e. cooldown for the first word, then cooldown for two words, then cooldown for all three words), with the numbers in parentheses being the original cooldowns before I changed them. So for instance, [b]5(15), 5(20), 5(45)[/b] means that the cooldown is now 5 seconds for all three words, whereas before the cooldown for the first word was 15 seconds, then 20 seconds for the second word, and 45 for the third.

[u]Unrelenting Force[/u]: 5(15), 5(20), 5(45)

[u]Dismay[/u]: 5(40), 5(45), 5(50)

[u]Whirlwind Sprint[/u]: 5(20), 5(25), 5(35)

[u]Become Ethereal[/u]: 5(20), 10(30), 15(40)

[u]Elemental Fury[/u]: 5(30), 5(40), 5(50)

[u]Fire Breath[/u]: 5(30), 5(50), 5(100)

[u]Dragonrend[/u]: 5(10), 5(12), 5(15)

[u]Call Dragon[/u]: 5(5), 5(5), 60(300)

[u]Slow Time[/u]: 5(30), 10(45), 15(60)

[u]Call of Valor[/u]: 30(180), 30(180), 30(180)

[u]Frost Breath[/u]: 5(30), 5(50), 5(100)

[u]Animal Allegiance[/u]: 5(50), 10(60), 15(70)

[u]Aura Whisper[/u]: 5(30), 5(40), 5(50)

[u]Marked for Death[/u]: 5(20), 10(30), 15(40)

[u]Storm Call[/u]: 15(300), 30(480), 45(600)

[u]Kyne's Peace[/u]: 5(40), 10(50), 15(60)

[u]Ice Form[/u]: 5(60), 5(90), 5(120)

[u]Disarm[/u]: 5(30), 10(35), 15(40)

[u]Summon Durnehviir[/u]: 5(5), 5(5), 60(300)

[u]Soul Tear[/u]: 5(5), 5(5), 20(90)

[u]Drain Vitality[/u]: 12(30), 12(60), 12(90)

[u]Bend Will[/u]: 5(10), 10(90), 15(120)

[u]Cyclone[/u]: 10(30), 10(45), 10(60)

[u]Battle Fury[/u]: 5(20), 5(30), 5(40)



[b][u]OTHER MODS BY ME[/u]:[/b]

2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30633]Als Paragon Reward Chest[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all 5 Paragons[/i]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30643]Als Konahrik[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all vanilla dragon priest masks with a previously missing boss fight[/i]
4. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30765]Als Treasure Map Reward[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all 11 Treasure Maps in vanilla Skyrim[/i]
5. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30915]Als Vault of the Old Slayer -- Requires All 10 Dragon Claws[/url] -- [i]modestly sized dungeon rewarding the completionist player who collects all Dragon Claws in vanilla Skyrim with fantastic amounts of treasure[/i]
